reviews.review: j,ame portal 2 parceque on pe cré notre propre test et bin plus encors...
Игра только людям имеющим мозг ведь это игра это пиздец я столько втыкал,но получил удовольствия. Желательно покупать по скидке. весит не много!! Удачи вам развиваться
Потрясающая игра! Возможно, тут собраны одни из лучших головоломок, что мне доводилось видеть. Ирония GLaDOS + комментарии Уитли = идеальная смесь для поднятия настроения.

İlk oyunundan sonra çıtasını baya baya yükseltmiş, enfes grafik, mekanik ve hikayeye sahip güzel bir yapım.

очень крутая игра стоит конечно 6$ но зато оочень крутая всем советую
this game is good unless your friend is mean. Then its bad.
Portal and Portal 2 are two of my favorite games of all time.  I can't recommend them enough!
Esta muy bueno el juego. Las gráficas muy realistas. Una muy buena historia Lo recomiendo demasiado.

Its portal 2 who wouldn't play it?

Great puzzle game and runs smooth though mine glitched

Portal 2 is an absolute classic, mind blowingly fun and a great time waster. When I played Portal 2 for the first time it was very hard and tricky and it made me think a lot. But now that i've played the game 3 times, on my 3rd playthrough, I was subconciously wizzing through every puzzle, trap and test chamber without dying a single time. Portal 2 is an amazing puzzle game, the story is amazing. For more like this game, check out Aperture Tag and Portal Stories: Mel.

Portal 2 is a journey that I can't replay it again. Probably in the future I will replay it again but for now...I just want to admire this game brilliant mechanic that integrates with all the environments of this game. Puzzle are fun and easy enough to be understand. In short, play this game if your like puzzles and exploration.
не играли в это  - не играли ни во что
This game is incredible and if you like to solve puzzles it is a must have.
One of the best designed and thoughtful games I have played.
I totally recommend this game for people who already played the first portal, as well as new players, of course to understand the story better you should definitely play Portal 1

É Portal 2! O que tenho a dizer?
A Valve trazendo mais melhorias em suas sequências mais uma vez.
Um detalhe: O jogo recebeu uma vasta atualização, trazendo o renderizador Vulkan e melhorando efeitos de iluminação em objetos, além de, trazendo varias otimizações de desempenho.
Recomendo e muito o jogo, tem vários mapas da comunidade, ferramentas e mods que existem e que virão ao jogo em breve.
quand y a 2 portails cv c facile mais si y en a plus c trop dur pour mon cerveau

Эта игра - не просто головоломка и не просто ходилка. Это что-то особенное, доселе невиданное в игровой вселенной., я не думал что стану ярым фанатом этой игры  Отличный сюжет, атмосфера, юмор, саундтрек и геймплей. Есть сетевой режим для игры с друзьями, также редактор карт и мастерская.

Portal 2 — Шедевр и Легенда
Обожаю Portal 2, респект разработчикам и создателям и т.д этой игры!
Рекомендую всем!
this is a great game and i have a great amount of time played, hoping to at some point increase my time played by 69,351 hours for no particular reason

A classic valve open source game, if only valve continued to make classics like this, or just retired after all the great ones they've done. However i can't play this alone and my mate always carries me, if you are inept of puzzles you might want a companion on this one

Such a good experience, loved it!
In my opinion, the best game of all time. I only wish I could play it for the first time again.
Best game i have ever played, I highly recommend you play and buy this game, It is the top game ever, Even in 2021
Buenísimo, no solo la jugabilidad y la historia, sino esos pequeños detallitos que si vas muy rápido te los saltas.

What can I say? It's a proven valve game. Polish and story up to professional standards, and not without the great fun you could have in it. Puzzles to make you feel like Einstein, and story to make you apart of the world. Portal 2 only shows Valve's passion and polish in the game industry.
Works great on Linux. Great story and music, interesting puzzles and game mechanics.
Прошёл с другом, и это лучшая игра которую я проходил.

Что ж, игра не плоха, всё на высоте и никаких претензий нет, но не забывайте наставления великого [quote=Мудрец] Наши неудачи неизбежны, даже если изменишь одну, сделаешь равноценную ей в будущем [/quote]

Smart, incredibly funny dialogue and a great follow up to the first one. Feeling, atmosphere, design, everything is top notch. Very much worth your money amd will not disappoint.
even though this game is "old" (for a game) it's well made and fun to play.

[h1]The puzzles are hard to get through, I think.[/h1]


There are no hints and it takes a very long time to get through some of the riddles.
The athmosphere is alright and the grapics are good.

The robots are funny and the controls are also very smooth.
If you are a little bit clever or like to find your way through these riddles,
then and only then, I will recommend you this game with lots of love.

In that case, there is absolutely nothing wrong with this game, I think.
The fact that you can play this in multiplayer - gives this game another plus point.
un des meilleurs jeu de tous les temps

if you have steam you need to get this game
